Interface ISaveGame

An immutable snapshot of the contents of a save for a given emulation that stores game resume data (savedata).

ISaveGame instances are immutable

Namespace: Snowflake.Orchestration.Saving
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface ISaveGame

Properties

CreatedTimestamp

The timestamp this save was created.

Declaration
DateTimeOffset CreatedTimestamp { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.DateTimeOffset

Guid

A unique GUID used to identify this ISaveGame within the context of an ISaveGameManager

Declaration
Guid Guid { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Guid

SaveContents

The read-only contents of the save.

Declaration
IReadOnlyDirectory SaveContents { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
IReadOnlyDirectory

SaveType

A unique identifier that identifies all saves of this particular type. Saves with the same identifier are expected to have the same folder and file structure.

Declaration
string SaveType { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Tags

Any string tags used to identify this save.

Declaration
IEnumerable<string> Tags { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String>
